page.title: 02ORIGIN OF VILLAGE
page.content: {Dalavich village was built in 1952. People came here because there were houses and jobs with the{Forestry {Commission. There are many more trees in the forest today than there were years ago.The population of Dalavich has gone down a lot since 1951.When the village started there were only 28 wooden houses,then came the stone houses with wooden shingles on the roof,making 44 houses altogether. The bus taking the older children to high school in Oban started running in 1961. In 1951 nobody came to Dalavich for a holiday but today holiday-makers come to stay in cabins,which were built 4 years ago.The church is the oldest building in the village.(see page 3).
